file.name: security.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Security Example
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: http://backend.com/path

paths:
  /only/basic:
    get:
      security:
        - really_basic: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

  /only/key:
    get:
      security:
        - my_api_key: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

  /only/oath2:
    get:
      security:
        - petstore_oauth2:
            - read:pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

  /only/oidc:
    get:
      security:
        - petstore_openid:
            - write:pets
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

  /and/based/auth:
    get:
      security:
        - petstore_oauth2:
            - read:pets
          #my_api_key: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

  /or/based/auth:
    get:
      security:
        - my_api_key: []
      #- really_basic: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Saying hello

components:
  securitySchemes:
    really_basic:
      type: http
      scheme: basic
      x-kong-security-basic-auth:
        tags:
          - should match
        config:
          hide_credentials: true
    my_api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: api_key_by_me
      in: header
      x-kong-security-basic-auth:
        tags:
          - should not match
    your_api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: api_key_by_you
      in: header
    petstore_oauth2:
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: http://example.org/api/oauth/dialog
          scopes:
            write:pets: modify pets in your account
            read:pets: read your pets
    petstore_openid:
      type: openIdConnect
      openIdConnectUrl: http://example.org/oid-discovery

Error: notImplemented: path "/and/based/auth": get: security: security "petstore_oauth2" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
